learning_language_disabled: Disabled when learning language is active
i18n_demo_subtitle: Experience the power of our multilingual infrastructure
switch_display_language: Switch display language using the flags above
set_learning_language: Set a learning language to see terms in that language
hover_over_terms: Hover over learnable terms to see translations
learnable_terms_description: These terms are displayed in the learning language. Hover over them to see translations.
learning_mode_description: You're learning {learningLanguage} while using the interface in {displayLanguage}. Study terms appear in {learningLanguage} with tooltips showing {displayLanguage} translations.
rtl_support_description: Hebrew language detected. The interface automatically switches to Right-to-Left (RTL) layout.
multilingual_description: Support for English, Hebrew, French, and Korean
learning_mode_description_short: Study terms in one language while using the interface in another
accessibility_description: Full RTL support, ARIA labels, and keyboard navigation
